dialogues.speaker: Agent 0077
dialogues.text:
The war was devastating. The Federation suffered terrible losses.
Our forces were pushed back to the colony planets. The resistance is
fragile.

dialogues.speaker: Rydian
dialogues.text:
I'm sorry I can't help you. I'm not authorized to give you that
information.

dialogues.speaker: Rydian
dialogues.text: I don't have it anymore. I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Rydian
dialogues.text:
I don't. I returned the top secret material to the Federation archives.
I couldn't bear to keep it.

dialogues.speaker: Rydian
